title: [Feat]: mention all team member in group like mobile app is working
body:
### Describe the feature

mention all team member in group like mobile app is working

### Motivation

In mobile app we can mention all by typing @all  but in teams-for-linux its not working.
Can you please add this feature, or if its available then provide specific mention word for all.

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
